thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Blair Phillips
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Blair Phillips

author: Blair Phillips
title: Blair Phillips
text: Works as advertised Sometimes not so good, but I can't blame Wilson for that. We are lucky to get any signal where I am at. I am at 87db right now. Usually lucky to get 120db on a normal night. I can use my cell service now for home phone and internet. I still want to go back on the roof and play with the antenna direction some more. I did the install in about an hour and have never tweaked it since.
